body_html:
Sure, I will try to write a unit test.

Currently, I can confirm that the logger can print evaluation result with a correct freq with my code after changing the code. The problem is that the original code cannot reachself._timer.update_last_triggered_step(self._iter_count) as it is after return

body:
Sure, I will try to write a unit test. 

Currently, I can confirm that the logger can print evaluation result with a correct freq with my code after changing the code. The problem is that the original code cannot reach`self._timer.update_last_triggered_step(self._iter_count)` as it is after `return`
